value.name: BASEBALL: Verdigris falls to Heritage Hall in 4A championship game
value.description: Gladu, Logan Hall and Luke Patterson saw time on the mound as well. The Chargers notched 11 hits, with four players finishing with two hits apiece. Heritage Hall threw four pitchers, but Thomas earned the victory with six strikeouts on 87 pitches through 3 ...

value.name: BASEBALL: Verdigris advances to 11th-consecutive state tournament
value.description: Hall drove in Luke Patterson and Luke Zaferes with his hit to center field. The Cardinals weren't content with that spread, though, especially after surrendering two leads to Sallisaw on Friday. The Black Diamonds answered in the third with an RBI single ...
